definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The explosion was caused by a burst gas pipe .
sentences.chinese: 這次爆炸是由一個爆裂的煤氣管引起的。

sentences.english: In a corner of the room behind a screen was a small gas stove and a refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 在房間一個角落的屏風後有一個小煤氣竈和一臺冰箱。

sentences.english: The indirect fume temperature regulator can save energy consumption and water consumption and solve the problem of gas leakage.
sentences.chinese: 本發明能節約能耗，水耗，並能避免煤氣泄漏的問題。

sentences.english: The meat will scorch if you don't lower the gas.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不把煤氣調小一點，肉就要焦了。

sentences.english: Within two months I had found myself a job at a local gas station.
sentences.chinese: 不到兩個月，我就在我家附近的煤氣站找到一份工作。

sentences.english: It is discussed how to apply intelligent regulator to control the combustion value of mixing gas.
sentences.chinese: 詣在探討應用智能調節器控制混合煤氣熱值。

sentences.english: She cooked meal for her husband with a gas stove.
sentences.chinese: 她用煤氣爐給丈夫做了一頓飯。

sentences.english: They will replace coal fires by gas.
sentences.chinese: 他們將用煤氣取代煤火。

sentences.english: In the first investigation, she was died from poisoning by gas.
sentences.chinese: 第一次調查中，她是死於煤氣中毒。

sentences.english: Can you smell a gas leak?
I put the pot on the gas-oven, and got away.
sentences.chinese: 我把壺放在煤氣竈上，然後就走開把這件事忘掉了。

sentences.english: Its cylinder was just an old piece of gas-pipe.
sentences.chinese: 這臺引擎的汽缸是用一截煤氣管改成的。

sentences.english: At that epoch there were no gas-jets in the streets of Paris.
sentences.chinese: 當時巴黎的街道上一盞煤氣燈也還沒有。

sentences.english: With the completion of a thermal power plant and a gas works in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 另有一座熱電廠和煤氣廠也即將先後建成。

sentences.english: The by-product gas of producing of traditional coking technique belongs to the gas of easy burning.
sentences.chinese: 傳統焦化工藝產生的副產品煤氣屬易燃氣體。

definition: abbr. for 聯想集團|联想集团[Lian2 xiang3 Ji2 tuan2]
to associate (cognitively)/to make an associative connection/mental association/word prediction and auto-complete functions of input method editing programs
to generate electricity/to send a telegram
to discharge smoke/to fume with rage
